Changes:
•  Streamlined a lot of the code.
•  Changed the Section 8 report to include summary client counts.
•  Add e-fax email address to the Places page.
•  Fixed a compiler error.
•  Updated Rep Payee Follow-up letters to reflect SSA rate increase.

•  Modified Section 8 report to provide more meaninful summary client counts.
•  Changed the sort of programs in the Section 8 report to display all residences first then CLOs.
•  Added new export that provides donations for individual donors within a time range.
•  Changed Victoria's EBT Cards billing report to J'neen.
•  Updated Rep Payee Follow-up and Individual Finance Letters to reflect new year.

•  Changed Amendments report to show bottom line totals.
•  Changed Individual Finance letters to automatically update rep payee fee from the AppParameters table.
•  Changed all reports signed by the Client Benefits manager to use a parameterized name and email address instead of hard coding them into the report.
•  Fixed logic bugs in client record deletion processes.
•  Applied some client letter changes requested by Perla.
•  Repaired a logic bug in Expiration Dates and Red Report processing.
•  Fixed bug in Contracts Amendments report.
•  Added listing of supervisors' direct reports to the Financial Reports menu.
• Added staff supervisor information to a staff person's People page.
• Fixed a query bug in the Expirations Dates report.
• Updated Individual Finance letters to reflect new CFO.
• Added SNAP Agency ID to the Demographics page.
• Enabled ability to flag deceased family members.
• Added Date of Last Rent Increase to HA data for Residential and CLO.  Added this data item to the Section 8 report.

• Fixed the Maximum Obligations spreadsheet export that was generating wrong values; only needed to be recompiled.
• Added a summary spreadsheet of the Contracts in Works report to the Financial Letters menu.
• Changed formatting of Expiration Dates report.
• Fixed an incorrect data field in the Contracts in Works summary spreadsheet.
• Changed Cluster Maintenance form to reflect organizational changes.
• Applied general maintenance to support tables.

• Removed PCA as a program.
• Family/Guardian new entries will enable TILLegram as the default setting.
• Fixed reporting error for contract amendments.
• Change available month range for Financial Reports.
•  Fixed a Financial Reports logic bug introduced in 7.27.
•  Changed Client Mailings export to include county of residence.
•  Changed Expiration Dates report to make pending TB tests more prominent in the report.
•  Database recovery.
•  Fixed fallout from email password changes.
•  Pared the list of contract staff.
•  Pared another list of contract staff.
•  Resolved data sync errors affecting Staff Evals and Supervisions and Expiration Dates.
•  Added fields to the NH Residential form.
•  Repaired field display logic for the Monthly Master maintenance form.

•  Fixed a logic bug when the People form is opened.
•  Fixed a data validation error when entering a new donation.

•  Changed the Donor Appeal export to more easily identify family and interested parties.
•  Added an Excel export for government accounts for residential clients.
•  Updated contract info that referenced Julie Wilson.
•  Changed the content of the Donor Appeal exports.

•  Added SSN and Rep Payee info to the Client Mailings export.
•  Changed email notification process to support new authorization method.
•  Changed spreadsheet export process.  Due to changes made by Microsoft, the ability to open Excel after an export is no longer supported.
•  Changed the EMM maintenance page to better identify changes made.

•  Hide supervision data in the Expiration Dates report.
•  Fixed a bug that throws a (harmless) query error when certain navigation actions are taken.
•  Added phone numbers to the Client Mailings export.
•  Changed the layout of the DDS Residential Contacts report.
•  Restored supervision data in the Expiration Dates report.
•  Fixed an error generated because of a bad email password.
•  Added a blank Individuals Finances letter for ABI clients.
•  Changed trigger for Evaluation Due in the Red Report.
•  Edited the content of the Day Program Disaster Recovery Plans.
•  Modified the Contracts in Works report to support different ranges of contracts.
•  Changed the criteria for identifying "Contract Staff".
•  Added room and board amounts to the Charges for Care Methods report.
•  Changed  the Individual Finances letters to remove references to the Rep Payee fee.
•  Changed  the Individual Finances letters to reflect new wording.
•  Changed the touch point for "Julie's Billings" to "Nada's Billings" to reflect change of responsibility.
•  Updated Disaster Recovery Contacts Reports.
•  	Edited the descriptive content of the Day Programs Disaster Recovery plans to reflect current organizational structure.
•  	Made several changes for ISP reporting.
•  	Updated "Nada's Billings" report.
•  Added "MassHealth Service Level" field for the Day Programs in response to new requirements from MassHeath.
•  Added a large font version of the Contacts Directory (i.e. the phone book).
•  Made changes necessary to support the new Residential Services hierarchy.
•  Additinoal changes  to support the new Residential Services hierarchy
•  Updated the client counts display from the People form.
•  Re-assigned Marcos' billings report to Farah.
•  Provided additional data fields for Day Clients to reflect when MassHealth level was changed and who made the change.

•  Changed the Springboard export to include home and mobile phone numbers.
